name: @platzh1rsch/pacman-canvas
description: A Pacman game written in TypeScript using Canvas

scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/gastronomy/*.svg" dist/assets/img/gastronomy && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/blinky/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/blinky && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/clyde/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/clyde && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/dazzled/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/dazzled && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/dazzled2/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/dazzled2 && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/dead/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/dead && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/inky/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/inky && copyfiles -s -f "src/assets/img/ghost/pinky/*.svg" dist/assets/img/ghost/pinky
scripts.build: pnpm clean && tsc --p ./tsconfig-build.json --noEmit false && vite build && pnpm copy-files
